structure.unit: ARTICLE III. REDEVELOPMENT OF MIAMI BEACH CITY CENTER/HISTORIC CONVENTION VILLAGE REDEVELOPMENT AND REVITALIZATION AREA

text.section: The Agency and the City Center/Historic Convention Village Redevelopment and Revitalization Area shall terminate on the earlier of: (1) the date all loans, advances, and indebtedness, if any, are no longer outstanding; or (2) March 31, 2044.
